hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
( cat <<EOF Index: sys/crypto/aesni/aesencdec.h =================================================================== --- sys/crypto/aesni/aesencdec.h (revision 280912) +++ sys/crypto/aesni/aesencdec.h (working copy) @@ -27,6 +27,11 @@ * */
+#ifdef _KERNEL +/* Suppress inclusion of gcc\'s mm_malloc.h header */ +#define _MM_MALLOC_H_INCLUDED 1 +#endif + #include <wmmintrin.h>
static inline void Index: sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_ghash.c =================================================================== --- sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_ghash.c (revision 280912) +++ sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_ghash.c (working copy) @@ -71,6 +71,11 @@ #include <stdint.h> #endif
+#ifdef _KERNEL +/* Suppress inclusion of gcc\'s mm_malloc.h header */ +#define _MM_MALLOC_H_INCLUDED 1 +#endif + #include <wmmintrin.h> #include <emmintrin.h> #include <smmintrin.h> Index: sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_wrap.c =================================================================== --- sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_wrap.c (revision 280912) +++ sys/crypto/aesni/aesni_wrap.c (working copy) @@ -45,6 +45,11 @@ #include <opencrypto/gmac.h>
#include "aesencdec.h" +#ifdef _KERNEL +/* Suppress inclusion of gcc\'s mm_malloc.h header */ +#define _MM_MALLOC_H_INCLUDED 1 +#endif + #include <smmintrin.h>
MALLOC_DECLARE(M_AESNI);
EOF ) > ${WORKSPACE}/patch1.txt
( cat <<EOF Index: Makefile.inc1 =================================================================== --- Makefile.inc1 (revision 280979) +++ Makefile.inc1 (working copy) @@ -1462,10 +1462,14 @@ _btxld= usr.sbin/btxld .endif .endif -.if ${TARGET_ARCH} != ${MACHINE_ARCH} + +.if ${BOOTSTRAPPING} < 1001507 .if ${MK_RESCUE} != "no" || defined(RELEASEDIR) _crunchide= usr.sbin/crunch/crunchide .endif +.endif + +.if ${TARGET_ARCH} != ${MACHINE_ARCH} .if ${TARGET_ARCH} == "i386" && defined(RELEASEDIR) _kgzip= usr.sbin/kgzip .endif EOF ) > ${WORKSPACE}/patch2.txt
svn revert -R sys/crypto/aesni svn revert Makefile.inc1 patch -f < ${WORKSPACE}/patch1.txt patch -f < ${WORKSPACE}/patch2.txt
/vm/freebsd-ci/scripts/build/cross-build.sh
